message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe would be of significant value to you. I'm confident it can generate substantial returns. I'm offering it to you for $1500000.  Let me know your thoughts.
Alice,  $1500000 is above my budget for this product.  I'm interested in it, but I'm only able to go up to $1000000 right now.  Let's see if we can find common ground.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your budget constraints. While $1000000 is below my desired price point, I'm willing to be flexible. I'm open to selling for $1250000. This allows for some room for negotiation but also reflects the value I believe this product holds. Let me know if this is something you can work with.
Alice,  $1250000 is still a bit higher than what I'm comfortable with.  To make this work, I'd need to come in at $1200000. This is my absolute ceiling. Let me know if you're able to accept that.
